MAL API

Documentation and implementation of the MyAnimeList (MAL) private API

About the project

Note: My Anime List has now released an official public API. This exists for legacy purposes as an example of my work in reverse engineering and documentation

Documentation on the (old) My Anime List (MAL) private API used in the official v0.11.8 Android app. Data was found through a mix of reverse engineering the decompiled APK as well as analyzing the network traffic from the app
